title: Support Vector Machine
description: Support Vector Machines (SVM) is a powerful and versatile supervised machine learning algorithm used for classification and regression tasks.

title: Linear vs Logistic Regression
description: Linear regression is a statistical method used for modeling the relationship between a dependent variable and one or more independent variables by fitting a linear equation to observed data.

title: Fourier Transform & Discrete Fourier Transform
description: In digital image processing, the spatial domain refers to the representation of an image as a two-dimensional grid of pixels.

title: FFT, Frequency Domain Filtering, Discrete Wavelet Transform
description: In this section, we will talk about Fast Fourier Transform (FFT), Frequency Domain Filtering, and Discrete Wavelet Transform.

title: Scrum
description: Scrum mendorong tim untuk belajar melalui pengalaman, mengatur diri saat bekerja menghadapi masalah.

title: Objective Key Result (OKR)
description: Konsep asli OKR yang berasal dari Intel kemudian menyebar ke perusahaan-perusahaan di Silicon Valley.

title: Analisis Data
description: Proses untuk mengubah data mentah menjadi informasi yang berguna. Ini melibatkan pembersihan, transformasi, dan pemodelan data.

title: Apa itu Data?
description: Different kinds of information, including information on people, places, objects, events, and concepts, can be represented by data.

title: Unsupervised Learning
description: Type of machine learning where the algorithm is trained on a dataset without explicit supervision.

title: Data Preprocessing
description: It involves cleaning and transforming raw data into a format that is suitable for analysis or for training machine learning models.
